Northeast ESP Links

Source: vignettes/esp-links.Rmd
esp-links.Rmd

ESPs at the NEFSC

An overview of ESPs and history of ESPs at the Northeast Fisheries Science Center can be found on our project page (https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/new-england-mid-atlantic/science-data/ecosystem-and-socioeconomic-profiles-northeast-united-states).

Links to all Northeast ESP reports and associated working papers by stock can be found at https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/new-england-mid-atlantic/ecosystems/ecosystem-and-socioeconomic-profile-development-and-reports. POC for each ESP is listed under each respective stock.

Project-specific code and resources

Bluefish

Github repository for the 2022 Bluefish ESP

https://github.com/atyrell3/RT2022/tree/main/bluefishESP

Black Sea Bass

Github repository for the 2023 Black sea bass ESP and ESP report card

https://github.com/ScottLarge-NOAA/bsb

Golden Tilefish

Github repository for the 2024 Golden tilefish ESP

https://github.com/SSalois1/tilefish_indicators
